H0.text: two examples where low voltage transformers are used. Doorbells

H1.text: two examples where low voltage transformers are used. Landscape Lighting

H2.text: two examples where low voltage transformers are used. Telephone Systems

H3.text: two examples where low voltage transformers are used. toys

A4.text: A doorbell transformer steps down the 120 or 240-volt AC electrical power to a lower voltage, typically 6 to 24 volts.

A5.text: The transformer primary winding, being energized continuously, does consume a small amount (about 1 to 2 watts) of standby power constantly;
